-- 03.04.2002 SH Add function 'Print list of codes' (=UserAction 13)
-- Shortcut labels
-- Shortcut handling
C: Create /new button
Q: Query button
M: Modify button
D: Delete button
I: Invoicenumbers
T: Translation
Create mode
Query, Modify, Translation, Invoicenumbers
IF user_language <> sys_language AND 'Create mode' THEN WARNING
"Please write the description in the systemlanguage (%1)"
(where %1 is the code of the system language)

ExpSyntax.val: InStr ({1,2},'M')>0 AND {1,4}<>'Q' AND (VarMod ('{0,3}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,4}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,5}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,6}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,7}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,14}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,15}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,16}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,17}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,18}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,19}'VAR) OR ExpCalc (2))
VarMod ('{0,20}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,21}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,22}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,29}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,36}'VAR)

Text.val: Check for errors
No errors
Data has changed ... ask for confirmation
Data has not changed ... just exit

ExpSyntax.val: VarMod ('{5,3}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,4}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,5}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,6}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,14}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,15}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,17}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,18}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,19}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,20}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,21}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,22}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,29}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,36}'VAR)
